verses.text: Thou also, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w tile|strong="H3843"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w pourtray|strong="H2710"\w* upon it the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add even\add* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*:

And \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w siege|strong="H4692"\w* against it, and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* a \w fort|strong="H1785"\w* against it, and \w cast|strong="H8210"\w* a \w mount|strong="H5550"\w* against it; \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* also against it, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add battering\add* \w rams|strong="H3733"\w* against it round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 4.2 \ft battering…: chief leaders\f*

Moreover \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thou unto thee an \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w pan|strong="H4227"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5414"\w* it \add for\add* a \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* between thee and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and \w set|strong="H3559"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against it, and it shall be \w besieged|strong="H4692"\w*, and thou shalt lay \w siege|strong="H6696"\w* against it. This \add shall be\add* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 4.3 \ft an…: or, a flat plate, or, slice\f*

\w Lie|strong="H7901"\w* thou also upon thy \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* upon it: \add according\add* to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that thou shalt \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* upon it thou shalt \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

For I have \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* upon thee the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ninety|strong="H8673"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: so shalt thou \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And when thou hast \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H0428"\w*, \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w again|strong="H8145"\w* on thy \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, and thou shalt \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: I have \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* thee each \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for a \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 4.6 \ft each…: Heb. a day for a year, a day for a year\f*

Therefore thou shalt \w set|strong="H3559"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w siege|strong="H4692"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and thine \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \add shall be\add* \w uncovered|strong="H2834"\w*, and thou shalt \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against it.

And, behold, I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w bands|strong="H5688"\w* upon thee, and thou shalt not \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* thee from one \w side|strong="H6654"\w* to \w another|strong="H6654"\w*, till thou hast \w ended|strong="H3615"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w siege|strong="H4692"\w*.\f + \fr 4.8 \ft from one…: Heb. from thy side to thy side\f*

¶ \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thou also unto thee \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, and \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, and \w beans|strong="H6321"\w*, and \w lentiles|strong="H5742"\w*, and \w millet|strong="H1764"\w*, and \w fitches|strong="H3698"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* thereof, \add according\add* to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that thou shalt \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* upon thy \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ninety|strong="H8673"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft fitches: or, spelt\f*

And thy \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* which thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add shall be\add* by \w weight|strong="H4946"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: from \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w time|strong="H6256"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it.

Thou shalt \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* also \w water|strong="H4325"\w* by \w measure|strong="H4884"\w*, the sixth \w part|strong="H8345"\w* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w*: from \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w time|strong="H6256"\w* shalt thou \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

And thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it \add as\add* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w cakes|strong="H5692"\w*, and thou shalt \w bake|strong="H5746"\w* it with \w dung|strong="H1561"\w* that cometh \w out|strong="H6627"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Even thus shall the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* their \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, whither I will \w drive|strong="H5080"\w* them.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, \w Ah|strong="H0162"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! behold, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath not been \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w*: for from my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* up even till now have I not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* of that which dieth of \w itself|strong="H5038"\w*, or is torn in \w pieces|strong="H2966"\w*; neither \w came|strong="H0935"\w* there \w abominable|strong="H6292"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* into my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Lo|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w cow’s|strong="H1241"\w* \w dung|strong="H6832"\w* for \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w dung|strong="H1561"\w*, and thou shalt \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* therewith.

Moreover he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, behold, I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*, and with \w care|strong="H1674"\w*; and they shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* by \w measure|strong="H4884"\w*, and with \w astonishment|strong="H8078"\w*:

That they may \w want|strong="H2637"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and be \w astonied|strong="H8074"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, and consume \w away|strong="H4743"\w* for their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.
